price: Daabi, Yεto Nokorε no bͻ nkontompo no, na (nkontompo no) atu ayera afri hͻ korakora; na hwε na nkontompo asopa. Adi nyε mo wͻ (nkontomposεm a) mode susu (Nyankopͻn) no!
arabic: بَلۡ نَقۡذِفُ بِٱلۡحَقِّ عَلَى ٱلۡبَٰطِلِ فَيَدۡمَغُهُۥ فَإِذَا هُوَ زَاهِقٞۚ وَلَكُمُ ٱلۡوَيۡلُ مِمَّا تَصِفُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: bal naqdhifu bil-ḥaqi ʿalā al-bāṭili fayadmaghuhu fa-idhā huwa zāhiqun walakumu al-waylu mimmā taṣifūna
